cta_desc: Start your journey with Entrfy and experience AI-powered email automation.
flow_step1_desc: Every incoming email is detected instantly by Entrfy in real-time.
flow_step2_desc: Emails are processed in an encrypted, isolated environment. We store nothing.
flow_step3_desc: Tier-0 → Tier-1 → Tier-2 pipeline analyzes content, tone and intent.
flow_step4_desc: Marketing, Finance, Personal, HR and more categories are auto-detected and colored.
flow_step5_desc: If the email needs a response, Entrfy automatically tags it as Awaiting Reply.
flow_step6_desc: Your rules and n8n workflows execute: routing, archiving, forwarding, notifications.
flow_step7_desc: Entrfy never stores your emails. All processing is encrypted and isolated.
